aboutMe: I’m a junior front-end developer, if you find my portfolio, then most likely you need a cool employee in your cool company, so keep my card bro)
name: Name:
skillsDescription: During my education I studied and began to put into practice the following technologies:
projectsDescription: During the training I created several projects, links to which you can find below
schoolDescription: I graduated from the physics and mathematics class of the Gymnasium №5 of Minsk. The school gave me good basic knowledge, including English.
universityDescription: I graduated from BNTU with a degree in civil engineering, the university taught me to think constructively and solve any task from an engineering point of view.
engineerDescription: Having gained experience as an engineer, I learned to carry out the tasks in accordance with the statement of work and technical documentation.
businessmanDescription: Having opened my own car wash, for 2 years of successful work, I learned how to manage a staff of 14 people, organize and delegate work, so that any task is completed on time and efficiently.
questDescription: Having opened my own quest-room in 2014, I learned to think outside the box and find several solutions for a seemingly basic task.
developerDescription: I took the course of it-incubator.by, acquired skills and created several projects presented in my portfolio.
feedBackDescription: If you want to contact me, my contacts can be found above or use the feedback form.
